GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeW.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt, before Write off of Debt Issuance Cost
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeW.description: Reflects the difference between the fair value of payments made to legally extinguish a debt and its carrying value at that time. This item excludes the write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance costs.

GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt.label: Gains (Losses) on Restructuring of Debt
GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt.description: For a debtor, the aggregate gain (loss) recognized on the restructuring of payables arises from the difference between the book value of the debt before the restructuring and the fair value of the payments on the debt after restructuring is complete.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

GuarantyAssets.label: Guaranty Assets
GuarantyAssets.description: The carrying amount of the contractual right to receive fees, as compensation in exchange for providing a guarantee to a third party, over life of the guarantee.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidDeferredExpense.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

InventoryFinishedGoods.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Gross
InventoryFinishedGoods.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryGross.label: Inventory, Gross
InventoryGross.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

InventoryRawMaterials.label: Inventory, Raw Materials, Gross
InventoryRawMaterials.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of raw materials expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

InvestmentOwnedUnderlyingFaceAmountAtMar.label: Investment Owned, Face Amount
InvestmentOwnedUnderlyingFaceAmountAtMar.description: Nominal or face amount on the investment owned.

LeaseIncentivePayableCurrent.label: Lease Incentive, Payable, Current
LeaseIncentivePayableCurrent.description: This item represents an incentive or inducement contractually stipulated between parties to a lease whereby the lessor has committed to provide the entity (lessee) with a cash payment as inducement to enter the lease. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseForgiveness1.label: Line of Credit Facility, Decrease, Forgiveness
LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseForgiveness1.description: Amount of decrease in line of credit facility from forgiveness by the holder of the line of credit.

LoansPayableToBankCurrent.label: Loans Payable to Bank, Current
LoansPayableToBankCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of current portion of long-term loans payable to bank due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LongTermDebtCurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
LongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermPurchaseCommitmentAmount.label: Long-term Purchase Commitment, Amount
LongTermPurchaseCommitmentAmount.description: The minimum amount the entity agreed to spend under the long-term purchase commitment.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Business Combination
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOwnershipInterestsOfferingCosts.label: Other Ownership Interests, Offering Costs
OtherOwnershipInterestsOfferingCosts.description: The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the other unit holders.

OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Other Prepaid Expense, Current
OtherPrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherUnderwritingExpense.label: Other Underwriting Expense
OtherUnderwritingExpense.description: Costs incurred during the period, such as those relating to general administration and policy maintenance that do not vary with and are not primarily related to the acquisition or renewal of insurance contracts.

PaymentsForProceedsFromRealEstatePartner.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Real Estate Partnership Investment, Net
PaymentsForProceedsFromRealEstatePartner.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the sale or purchase of and distributions from real estate partnership investment during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.label: Payments to Acquire Additional Interest in Subsidiaries
PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.label: Preferred Stock, Dividend Rate, Percentage
PreferredStockDividendRatePercentage.description: The percentage rate used to calculate dividend payments on preferred stock.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.label: Proceeds from Sale of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities that had been designated as held-to-maturity. Excludes proceeds from maturities, prepayments and calls by the issuer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent.label: Product Warranty Accrual, Current
ProductWarrantyAccrualClassifiedCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForOtherLosses.label: Provision for Other Losses
ProvisionForOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related to other loss.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

RealEstateOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation.label: Real Estate Owned, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateOwnedAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation for real estate owned (REO).

RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.label: Related Party Transaction, Purchases from Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.description: Purchases during the period (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrentAndNoncur.label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable
SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrentAndNoncur.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Weighted Average Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Rate of weighted-average expected volatility for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Aggregate Intrinsic Value, Outstanding
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Intrinsic value of outstanding award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

VariableLeasePayment.label: Variable Lease, Payment
VariableLeasePayment.description: Amount of cash outflow for variable lease payment excluded from lease liability.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing, Interest Rate
AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.description: Reflects the effective interest rate as of the balance sheet date on interest-bearing trade payables.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentageO.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage of Principal Amount Redeemed
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentageO.description: Percentage of principal amount of debt redeemed.

DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Current, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from provisions, reserves, allowances, and accruals, classified as other.

Deposits.label: Deposits
Deposits.description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities and Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued expenses, and obligations classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent assets classified as other.

InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

LongTermAccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableN.label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
LongTermAccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableN.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivables, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherInventoryNetOfReserves.label: Other Inventory, Net of Reserves
OtherInventoryNetOfReserves.description: Amount, after of valuation reserves and allowances, of inventory, classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

PercentageOfDebtHedgedByInterestRateDeri.label: Percentage of Debt Hedged by Interest Rate Derivatives
PercentageOfDebtHedgedByInterestRateDeri.description: Percentage of an entity's outstanding debt that is designated as a hedged item in cash flow, fair value, or net investment hedge.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue.label: Recognition of Deferred Revenue
RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue.description: The amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. For cash flows, this element primarily pertains to amortization of deferred credits on long-term arrangements. As a noncash item, it is deducted from net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPer.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Percentage
RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPer.description: Percentage of remaining performance obligation to total remaining performance obligation not recognized as revenue.

SellingAndMarketingExpense.label: Selling and Marketing Expense
SellingAndMarketingExpense.description: The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price of options that were either forfeited or expired.

AccruedMarketingCostsCurrent.label: Accrued Marketing Costs, Current
AccruedMarketingCostsCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for the marketing, trade and selling of the entity's goods and services. Marketing costs would include expenditures for planning and executing the conception, pricing, promotion, and distribution of ideas, goods, and services; costs of public relations and corporate promotions; and obligations incurred and payable for sales discounts, rebates, price protection programs, etc. offered to customers and under government programs. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityT.label: Business Acquisition, Transaction Costs
BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityT.description: Amount of direct costs of the business combination including legal, accounting, and other costs incurred to consummate the business acquisition.

BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCos.label: Business Combination, Acquisition Related Costs
BusinessCombinationAcquisitionRelatedCos.description: This element represents acquisition-related costs incurred to effect a business combination which costs have been expensed during the period. Such costs include finder's fees; advisory, legal, accounting, valuation, and other professional or consulting fees; general administrative costs, including the costs of maintaining an internal acquisitions department; and may include costs of registering and issuing debt and equity securities.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ConstructionInProgressGross.label: Construction in Progress, Gross
ConstructionInProgressGross.description: Amount of structure or a modification to a structure under construction. Includes recently completed structures or modifications to structures that have not been placed into service.

DebtCurrent.label: Debt, Current
DebtCurrent.description: Amount of short-term debt and current maturity of long-term debt and capital lease obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentGross.label: Debt Issuance Cost, Gross, Noncurrent
DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Foreign, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax settlement.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentChargeOnReclassifiedAssets.label: Impairment Charge on Reclassified Assets
ImpairmentChargeOnReclassifiedAssets.description: For the asset that is reclassified back to held and used from held-for-sale, the amount of impairment charge that is recognized on the reclassification date.

IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

IntangibleAssetsCurrent.label: Intangible Assets, Current
IntangibleAssetsCurrent.description: The current portion of nonphysical assets, excluding financial assets, if these assets are classified into the current and noncurrent portions.

InterestAccrualRateAssociatedWithAmortiz.label: Interest Accrual Rate Associated with Amortization Method of Present Value of Future Insurance Profits
InterestAccrualRateAssociatedWithAmortiz.description: Rate of interest used in determination of present value of future profits on insurance contract acquired in business combination.

InterestExpenseDebt.label: Interest Expense, Debt
InterestExpenseDebt.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

InventoryWriteDown.label: Inventory Write-down
InventoryWriteDown.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.label: Investment Owned, Percent of Net Assets
InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category should have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermLoansPayable.label: Loans Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermLoansPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

LongtermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Amount
LongtermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.description: The portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOp.label: Other Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
OtherIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOp.description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

OtherLoansPayableCurrent.label: Other Loans Payable, Current
OtherLoansPayableCurrent.description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Operating Activities
PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability exceeding amount recognized at acquisition date. Includes, but is not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

ProductWarrantyAccrualWarrantiesIssued.label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Increase for Warranties Issued
ProductWarrantyAccrualWarrantiesIssued.description: Amount of increase in the standard and extended product warranty accrual from warranties issued.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RetainedEarningsAppropriated.label: Retained Earnings, Appropriated
RetainedEarningsAppropriated.description: A segregation of retained earnings which is unavailable for dividend distribution. Includes also retained earnings appropriated for loss contingencies.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

WeightedAverageNumberBasicSharesOutstand.label: Weighted Average Number Basic Shares Outstanding Adjustment, Pro Forma
WeightedAverageNumberBasicSharesOutstand.description: Adjustment to the weighted average number of basic shares outstanding to convert this to a pro forma presentation.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
AccountsReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarr.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Warrant Issued
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarr.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from the issuance of warrants. Includes allocation of proceeds of debt securities issued with detachable stock purchase warrants.

CommonStockConvertibleConversionPriceInc.label: Common Stock, Convertible, Conversion Price, Increase
CommonStockConvertibleConversionPriceInc.description: Per share increase in conversion price of convertible common stock. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Fee Amount
DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.description: Amount of the fee that accompanies borrowing money under the debt instrument.

DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurren.label: Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities, Current
DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurren.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income during the current period and current obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, current).

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAmortizati.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Costs, Amortization Expense, Excluding Accrued Interest
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCostsAmortizati.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs, excluding accrued interest on unamortized balance.

FairValueAdjustmentOfWarrants.label: Fair Value Adjustment of Warrants
FairValueAdjustmentOfWarrants.description: Amount of expense (income) related to adjustment to fair value of warrant liability.

IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Derivative Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

InterestCostsCapitalized.label: Interest Costs Capitalized
InterestCostsCapitalized.description: Amount of interest capitalized during the period.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

NotesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties
NotesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay.

OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other liabilities.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.label: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs
ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.description: The cash inflow from additional borrowings, net of cash paid to third parties in connection with debt origination.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average fair value as of the grant date of equity-based award plans other than stock (unit) option plans that were not exercised or put into effect as a result of the occurrence of a terminating event.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Aggregate Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which current fair value of underlying stock exceeds exercise price of fully vested and expected to vest exercisable or convertible options. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease.label: Stock Option, Exercise Price, Increase
StockOptionExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of option. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision and option granted under share-based payment arrangement.

UnrealizedLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Loss on Securities
UnrealizedLossOnSecurities.description: The increase (decrease), resulting in a loss, in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of securities held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

GoodwillPurchaseAccountingAdjustments.label: Goodwill, Purchase Accounting Adjustments
GoodwillPurchaseAccountingAdjustments.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from adjustments after acquisition date under purchase accounting of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

InventoryAdjustments.label: Inventory Adjustments
InventoryAdjustments.description: Amount of inventory reserves for last-in first-out (LIFO) and other inventory valuation methods.

LossContingencyReceivable.label: Loss Contingency, Receivable
LossContingencyReceivable.description: Amount of receivable related to a loss contingency accrual. For example, an insurance recovery receivable.

OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit).

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfFinanceRe.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfFinanceRe.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale or collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest exercisable options that may be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest exercisable or convertible options. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.label: Allowance for Doubtful Other Receivables, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.description: Amount of valuation allowance for receivables classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Issuances
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of issuances of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Period Increase (Decrease)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability Value
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Fair value of financial instrument classified as a liability measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.label: Gain (Loss) on Termination of Lease
GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.description: Amount of gain (loss) on termination of lease before expiration of lease term.

LongtermDebtPercentageBearingVariableInt.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Variable Interest, Amount
LongtermDebtPercentageBearingVariableInt.description: The portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a rate subject to change from time to time.

PaymentsOfLoanCosts.label: Payments of Loan Costs
PaymentsOfLoanCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Warrants
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfWarrants.description: The cash inflow from issuance of rights to purchase common shares at predetermined price (usually issued together with corporate debt).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConv.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Convertible Debt with Conversion Feature
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConv.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from recognition of deferred taxes for convertible debt with a beneficial conversion feature.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Liabilities Incurred
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of liabilities incurred by the acquirer as part of consideration transferred in a business combination.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

HealthCareOrganizationAllowanceForDoubtf.label: Health Care Organization, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Percentage of Accounts Receivable
HealthCareOrganizationAllowanceForDoubtf.description: Ratio of the allowance for doubtful accounts to accounts receivable, expressed as a percentage, for health care organizations.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PrepaidTaxes.label: Prepaid Taxes
PrepaidTaxes.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.

SharesIssued.label: Shares, Issued
SharesIssued.description: Number of shares of stock issued as of the balance sheet date, including shares that had been issued and were previously outstanding but which are now held in the treasury.

AccountsReceivablePurchase.label: Accounts Receivable, Purchase
AccountsReceivablePurchase.description: Amount of increase from purchase of accounts receivable.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEqui.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Equity Component of Convertible Debt
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEqui.description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AmountOfImpairmentToCarryingAmountOfRegu.label: Amount of Impairment to Carrying Amount of Regulatory Assets
AmountOfImpairmentToCarryingAmountOfRegu.description: Discloses the amount of any reduction to the carrying amounts of regulated assets that result from impairment (for example, rate actions of a regulator).

BasicEarningsPerShareProForma.label: Basic Earnings Per Share, Pro Forma
BasicEarningsPerShareProForma.description: Pro forma basic earnings per share or earnings per unit, which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.

DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Gain (Loss)
DebtAndEquitySecuritiesGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1.label: Deferred Revenue, Revenue Recognized
DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilityIntraEntityTransferA.label: Deferred Tax Liability, Intra-entity Transfer, Asset Other than Inventory
DeferredTaxLiabilityIntraEntityTransferA.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to intra-entity transfer of asset within consolidated group. Excludes intra-entity transfer of inventory.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability
FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentLiabili.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentLiabili.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

InsuranceCommissionsAndFees.label: Insurance Commissions and Fees
InsuranceCommissionsAndFees.description: Income from agency and brokerage operations (includes sales of annuities and supplemental contracts); service charges, commissions, and fees from the sale of insurance and related services; and management fees from separate accounts, deferred annuities, and universal life products.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalanceShar.label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Balance, Shares
InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalanceShar.description: Number of securities sold short (the short position) as of the end of the period.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LoansReceivableWithFixedRatesOfInterest1.label: Loans Receivable with Fixed Rates of Interest
LoansReceivableWithFixedRatesOfInterest1.description: Amount of loan with fixed rate of interest.

LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Percentage Rate
LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.description: The interest rate applicable to the portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Sought, Value
LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.description: The value (monetary amount) of the award the plaintiff seeks in the legal matter.

LossContingencyLossInPeriod.label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period
LossContingencyLossInPeriod.description: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherDerivativesNotDesignatedAsHedgingIn.label: Other Derivatives Not Designated as Hedging Instruments Liabilities at Fair Value
OtherDerivativesNotDesignatedAsHedgingIn.description: Fair value of all derivative liabilities not designated as a hedging instrument.

OtherInventoryPurchasedGoods.label: Other Inventory, Purchased Goods, Gross
OtherInventoryPurchasedGoods.description: Gross amount of components used by the entity which are bought from another entity rather than produced by the entity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RestructuringReserve.label: Restructuring Reserve
RestructuringReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsFinan.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Proceeds, Financing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsFinan.description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent.label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable, Current
SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

SalesCommissionsAndFees.label: Sales Commissions and Fees
SalesCommissionsAndFees.description: Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

SharesOutstanding.label: Shares, Outstanding
SharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInter.label: Short-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest Rate
ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedInter.description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

AccruedLiabilitiesAndOtherLiabilities.label: Accrued Liabilities and Other Liabilities
AccruedLiabilitiesAndOtherLiabilities.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid nor invoiced, and liabilities classified as other.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.description: Amount of direct write-downs of accounts receivable charged against the allowance.

CashCashEquivalentsAndShortTermInvestmen.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, and Short-term Investments
CashCashEquivalentsAndShortTermInvestmen.description: Cash includes currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. It also includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits in that the customer may deposit additional funds at any time and effectively may withdraw funds at any time without prior notice or penalty. Cash equivalents, excluding items classified as marketable securities, include short-term, highly liquid Investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash, and so near their maturity that they present minimal risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. For example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months. Short-term investments, exclusive of cash equivalents, generally consist of marketable securities intended to be sold within one year (or the normal operating cycle if longer) and may include trading securities, available-for-sale securities, or held-to-maturity securities (if maturing within one year), as applicable.

ConvertibleNotesPayable.label: Convertible Notes Payable
