ConvertibleNotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a written promise to pay a note, initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, which can be exchanged for a specified amount of one or more securities (typically common stock), at the option of the issuer or the holder.

DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Compensation Expense
DeferredCompensationArrangementWithIndiv.description: The compensation expense recognized during the period pertaining to the deferred compensation arrangement.

InventoryRawMaterialsAndSupplies.label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Supplies, Gross
InventoryRawMaterialsAndSupplies.description: Gross amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed.

LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInter.label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase, Accrued Interest
LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseAccruedInter.description: Increase for accrued, but unpaid interest on the credit facility for the period.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

ObligationWithJointAndSeveralLiabilityAr.label: Obligation with Joint and Several Liability Arrangement, Amount Outstanding
ObligationWithJointAndSeveralLiabilityAr.description: Amount outstanding, before the effects of recovery, of obligation under the joint and several liability arrangement.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncome.label: Other Noncash Income
OtherNoncashIncome.description: Amount of income or gain included in net income that result in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Excluding Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes option exercised.

ProceedsFromRepaymentOfLoansToPurchaseCo.label: Proceeds from Repayment of Loans to Purchase Common Stock
ProceedsFromRepaymentOfLoansToPurchaseCo.description: Cash inflow from repayment of loans for purchasing common stock.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received Per Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.description: Amount of consideration received by subsidiary or equity investee in exchange for shares of stock issued or sold. Includes amount of cash received, fair value of noncash assets received, and fair value of liabilities assumed by the investor.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Option, Nonvested, Weighted Average Exercise Price
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options outstanding.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

BankruptcyClaimsAmountPaidToSettleClaims.label: Bankruptcy Claims, Amount Paid to Settle Claims
BankruptcyClaimsAmountPaidToSettleClaims.description: Amount paid to settle bankruptcy claim.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount of Contingent Consideration, Asset
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the value of right to a contingent consideration asset.

ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Amount Converted
ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.description: "The value of the stock converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

ConversionOfStockSharesIssued1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Issued
ConversionOfStockSharesIssued1.description: "The number of new shares issued in the conversion of stock in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DebtSecuritiesGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DeferredRevenueAdditions.label: Deferred Revenue, Additions
DeferredRevenueAdditions.description: Amount of deferred revenue recognized for transactions arising during the current reporting period. Deferred revenue is a liability as of the balance sheet date related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized. Generally, an Entity records deferred revenue when it receives consideration from a customer before achieving certain criteria that must be met for revenue to be recognized in conformity with GAAP.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment, Excluding Oil and Gas Property and Timber Property
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, excluding oil and gas property and timber property.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributabl.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributabl.description: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.

PaymentsForDeposits.label: Payments for Deposits
PaymentsForDeposits.description: The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Financing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accounts Payable
AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossRecoveryOfBa.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Loss, Recovery of Bad Debts
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossRecoveryOfBa.description: Amount of recovery of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially written-off as bad debts.

ConvertibleDebt.label: Convertible Debt
ConvertibleDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentAmount1.label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Amount
DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentAmount1.description: "The value of the financial instrument(s) that the original debt is being converted into in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

EnergyRelatedInventoryNaturalGasInStorag.label: Energy Related Inventory, Natural Gas in Storage
EnergyRelatedInventoryNaturalGasInStorag.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas in storage, which is a mixture of gases (liquefied or otherwise), used for fuel and manufacturing purposes, which is ready for sale.

GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.label: Gain (Loss) Related to Litigation Settlement
GainLossRelatedToLitigationSettlement.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in settlement of litigation and insurance claims. Excludes claims within an insurance entity's normal claims settlement process.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidTaxes.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Taxes
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidTaxes.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits in future periods.

InterestPayableCurrent.label: Interest Payable, Current
InterestPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

LitigationSettlementExpense.label: Litigation Settlement, Expense
LitigationSettlementExpense.description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

LitigationSettlementInterest.label: Litigation Settlement Interest
LitigationSettlementInterest.description: Interest expense (income) directly attributable to an award in settlement of litigation.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

PaymentsForBrokerageFees.label: Payments for Brokerage Fees
PaymentsForBrokerageFees.description: The amount of cash paid for brokerage fees during the current period. This element is intended to represent the brokerage fees paid by and between financial industry participants.

PaymentsOfDerivativeIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Derivative Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDerivativeIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of a derivative security.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

ReceivablesFromCustomers.label: Receivables from Customers
ReceivablesFromCustomers.description: Amount due from customers for fees and charges arising from transactions related to the entity's brokerage activities and operations.

RelatedPartyTransactionRate.label: Related Party Transaction, Rate
RelatedPartyTransactionRate.description: Identify the stated interest rate per the agreement, for example, leasing and debt arrangements between related parties.

StandardProductWarrantyAccrualPayments.label: Standard Product Warranty Accrual, Decrease for Payments
StandardProductWarrantyAccrualPayments.description: Amount of decrease in the standard product warranty accrual from payments made in cash or in kind to satisfy claims under the terms of the standard product warranty. Excludes extended product warranties.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Accrued Professional Fees
AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received.

AdjustmentOfWarrantsGrantedForServices.label: Adjustment of Warrants Granted for Services
AdjustmentOfWarrantsGrantedForServices.description: Adjustment for noncash service expenses paid for by granting of warrants.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNo.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNo.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent.

BorrowingsUnderGuaranteedInvestmentAgree.label: Borrowings under Guaranteed Investment Agreements
BorrowingsUnderGuaranteedInvestmentAgree.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the sum of the obligations to contract holders to provide to them an agreed upon rate of return pursuant to the terms of the underlying contract. These contracts represent lending by the contract holders to the entity in return for a guaranteed (primarily fixed) interest rate until maturity, unless called earlier if the contracts provide that option to the contract holders (usually institutions). There is little or no insurance risk for the entity.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

DeferredFederalStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBe.label: Deferred Federal, State and Local, Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBe.description: Amount of deferred state, local, and federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDev.label: Deferred Tax Assets, in Process Research and Development
DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDev.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from in-process research and development costs expensed in connection with a business combination.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Domestic
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible domestic operating loss carryforwards. Excludes state and local operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPrepaidExpenses.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Prepaid Expenses
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPrepaidExpenses.description: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from prepaid expenses.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Settlement, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxS.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other income tax settlements.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity, Prior Period Adjustment
IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.description: The tax effect of correction of an error charged or credited directly to the opening balance of retained earnings.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

InterestCostsIncurred.label: Interest Costs Incurred
InterestCostsIncurred.description: Total interest costs incurred during the period and either capitalized or charged against earnings.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InvestmentIncomeDividend.label: Investment Income, Dividend
InvestmentIncomeDividend.description: Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

JuniorSubordinatedLongTermNotes.label: Junior Subordinated Notes, Noncurrent
JuniorSubordinatedLongTermNotes.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments, excluding current portion.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate at Period End
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.description: The effective interest rate at the end of the reporting period.

LoansAssumed1.label: Loans Assumed
LoansAssumed1.description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

PaymentsForOtherOperatingActivities.label: Payments for Other Operating Activities
PaymentsForOtherOperatingActivities.description: Amount of cash outflow for operating activities classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

ProceedsFromRepaymentOfLoansByEmployeeSt.label: Proceeds from Repayment of Loans by Employee Stock Ownership Plans
ProceedsFromRepaymentOfLoansByEmployeeSt.description: The cash inflow from the financed defined contribution plan to acquire shares of the entity. The plan initially holds the shares in a suspense account, which is collateral for the loan. As the plan makes payment on the debt, the shares are released from the suspense account and become available to be allocated to participant accounts.

SecuredDebtOther.label: Secured Debt, Other
SecuredDebtOther.description: Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Agreed-upon price for the exchange of the underlying asset relating to the share-based payment award.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Granted
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of non-option equity instruments granted to participants.

StockholdersEquityOther.label: Stockholders' Equity, Other
StockholdersEquityOther.description: This element represents movements included in the statement of changes in stockholders' equity which are not separately disclosed or provided for elsewhere in the taxonomy.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Increase
WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

AccountsPayableOtherCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Other, Current
AccountsPayableOtherCurrent.description: Amount of obligations incurred classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

FinancingReceivableLoanInProcess.label: Financing Receivable, Loan in Process
FinancingReceivableLoanInProcess.description: Amount of undisbursed portion of financing receivable balance. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

LongTermLineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit, Noncurrent
LongTermLineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Paid, Value
LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue.description: Amount of damages paid to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

NotesPayableToBankNoncurrent.label: Notes Payable to Bank, Noncurrent
NotesPayableToBankNoncurrent.description: The total amount due within more than 12 month, or the operating cycle if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.

NumberOfReportingUnits.label: Number of Reporting Units
NumberOfReportingUnits.description: Number of reporting units tested for impairment of goodwill. A reporting unit is an operating segment or one level below an operating segment.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.label: Principal Amount Outstanding of Loans Held-in-portfolio
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.description: This is the result of the principal amount outstanding of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

ReportingUnitAmountOfFairValueInExcessOf.label: Reporting Unit, Amount of Fair Value in Excess of Carrying Amount
ReportingUnitAmountOfFairValueInExcessOf.description: Amount of fair value of reporting unit in excess of carrying amount.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurre.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurre.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.label: Interest on Convertible Debt, Net of Tax
InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.description: The after-tax amount of interest recognized in the period associated with any convertible debt.

LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.label: Line of Credit Facility, Average Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.label: Proceeds from Legal Settlements
ProceedsFromLegalSettlements.description: Cash received for the settlement of litigation during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.description: Amount of cash inflow for the sale of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisposals.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Disposals
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisposals.description: Amount of divestiture of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of the conversion of convertible securities.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesI.label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Shares Issued
DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesI.description: "The number of shares issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or payments in the period."

GainLossOnContractTermination.label: Gain (Loss) on Contract Termination
GainLossOnContractTermination.description: Gain (loss) related to the termination of a contract between the parties. The termination may be due to many causes including early termination of a lease by a lessee, a breach of contract by one party, or a failure to perform.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccountsPayable.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of operating lease payments.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

LongTermInvestmentsAndReceivablesNet.label: Long-term Investments and Receivables, Net
LongTermInvestmentsAndReceivablesNet.description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle) and amount due to the Entity from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such investments and receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

NotesAndLoansPayable.label: Notes and Loans Payable
NotesAndLoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherCommitment.label: Other Commitment
OtherCommitment.description: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingVariableIn.label: Short-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Variable Interest Rate
ShortTermDebtPercentageBearingVariableIn.description: The portion of the carrying amount of short-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, which accrues interest at a rate subject to change from time to time.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrent.label: Workers' Compensation Liability, Current
WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

ConversionOfStockAmountIssued1.label: Conversion of Stock, Amount Issued
ConversionOfStockAmountIssued1.description: "The value of the financial instrument issued [noncash or part noncash] in the conversion of stock. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

EquityFairValueAdjustment.label: Equity, Fair Value Adjustment
EquityFairValueAdjustment.description: Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which an instrument classified in shareholders' equity could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.

LitigationReserveCurrent.label: Estimated Litigation Liability, Current
LitigationReserveCurrent.description: Carrying amount of reserve for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid within one year of the date of the statement of financial position.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other assets.

ReductionsInOtherAssetsAmount.label: Reductions in Other Assets, Amount
ReductionsInOtherAssetsAmount.description: Amount of significant reductions in the period of other assets (current, noncurrent, or unclassified).

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Number of Shares, Period Increase (Decrease)
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of increase (decrease) of non-vested options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Long-term Debt
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of long-term debt due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Indefinite-Lived Intangible Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, that lack physical substance, having a projected indefinite period of benefit, acquired at the acquisition date.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutur.label: Common Stock, Capital Shares Reserved for Future Issuance
CommonStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutur.description: Aggregate number of common shares reserved for future issuance.

DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.description: Amount, before allocation of a valuation allowances, of deferred tax assets attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards including, but not limited to, research, foreign, general business, alternative minimum tax, and other deductible tax credit carryforwards.

DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfAdjustmentT.label: Discontinued Operation, Amount of Adjustment to Prior Period Gain (Loss) on Disposal, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationAmountOfAdjustmentT.description: Amount after tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for asset, excluding financial asset and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.label: Net Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

ProductWarrantyAccrual.label: Standard and Extended Product Warranty Accrual
ProductWarrantyAccrual.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for estimated claims under standard and extended warranty protection rights granted to customers.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

SalesTypeLeaseInitialDirectCostExpenseCo.label: Sales-type Lease, Initial Direct Cost Expense, Commencement
SalesTypeLeaseInitialDirectCostExpenseCo.description: Amount of sales-type lease initial direct cost recognized as expense at commencement date.

CostMaintenance.label: Cost, Maintenance
CostMaintenance.description: Cost of maintenance incurred and directly related to good produced and service rendered.

FairValueOfAssetsAcquired.label: Fair Value of Assets Acquired
FairValueOfAssetsAcquired.description: The fair value of assets acquired in noncash investing or financing activities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

LongTermNotesPayable.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
LongTermNotesPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

PrepaidAdvertising.label: Prepaid Advertising
PrepaidAdvertising.description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for advertising that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTr.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership before Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipBeforeTr.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company before stock transaction.

SubleaseIncome.label: Sublease Income
SubleaseIncome.description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelated.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable, Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelated.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for goods and services provided by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries, subsidiaries of a common parent, an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRela.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable, Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRela.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due to the reporting entity for good and services provided to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

LiabilitiesAssumed1.label: Liabilities Assumed
LiabilitiesAssumed1.description: The fair value of liabilities assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

AverageSalesPrices.label: Oil and Gas, Average Sale Price
AverageSalesPrices.description: Sales price per unit of oil and gas produced.
